questions.question: For a clothing brand targeting young adults, what type of tone should the brand voice have?
options: A) Professional and corporate
B) Casual, relatable, and upbeat
C) Formal and authoritative

questions.question: As a business owner, you want your brand to connect emotionally with customers. Which of the following would help achieve that?
options: A) Focusing on the logical benefits of your product
B) Using visuals and language that evoke feelings like happiness or trust
C) Offering discounts only during holidays

questions.question: Assuming you are the founder of a clothing line, what would be a strong starting point for telling your brand’s story?
options: A) Highlighting why your prices are the lowest in the market
B) Sharing how you noticed a gap in the market for stylish, affordable workwear
C) Focusing on your team’s work experience

questions.question: If you were to position your brand as a solution for young professionals who need stylish office wear, what would be your unique selling point (USP)?
options: A) Offering trendy outfits for all age groups
B) Offering stylish, yet affordable office wear for young professionals
C) Focusing on discount offers

questions.question: Your client is starting a fitness app and needs a brand name. What is the most important factor in naming the app?
options: A) It should be easy to spell and remember
B) It should be a long, descriptive name
C) It should be a random word that sounds modern

questions.question: How can you create a memorable experience when customers visit your store?
options: A) Provide personalized services or small touches like thank-you notes
B) Focus solely on the product features and ignore customer interaction
C) Use generic advertising materials in the store

questions.question: Which of the following would be the best offline branding strategy for a skincare brand?
options: A) Offer discounts via social media posts only
B) Create branded packaging with your logo and a catchy slogan
C) Focus only on in-store promotions and ignore packaging

questions.question: What type of brand message helps customers who want to feel confident and beautiful?
options: A) 'Affordable beauty, with no compromises.'
B) 'Feel confident and beautiful, inside and out.'
C) 'This is the best product for your skin, no matter your needs.'

questions.question: What kind of tagline would resonate best for a food delivery service?
options: A) 'Delivering happiness to your door, one meal at a time!'
B) 'Your meal, your way, anytime.'
C) 'Bringing you the freshest ingredients for your cooking.'

questions.question: What’s one way to position your brand effectively in a competitive market?
options: A) Focus on offering the lowest prices
B) Solve a specific problem or fill a gap that competitors aren’t addressing
C) Use generic advertisements and ignore customer feedback
